title: Uyire Uyire Piriyadhe Song Lyrics Santhosh Subramaniam
stanzas: <div>Uyire Uyire Piriyadhe Song Lyrics Santhosh Subramaniam

Uyire uyire piriyadhe
uyirai thookki eriyadhe
unnai pirindhaal
ulagam kidaiyaathe
o oh..

kanave kanave kalaiyadhe
kanneer thuliyil karaiyadhe
nee illaamal irave vidiyathe
o  oh..

penne nee varum munne
oru bommai pole irundhen
punnagaiyaale mugavari
thanthaaye oh ooh..

aayul muzhudhum anbe
un aruginil
vazhndhida ninaithaen
arainodi minnal pole sendraye

Uyire uyire piriyadhe
uyirai thookki eriyadhe
unnai pirindhaal
ulagam kidaiyaathe
o oh..

pul mael vazhum
panithaan kaainthaalum
thalaimael thaangiya
neram konjam
aanaal porkkaalam

un arugaamai athai
naan ilanthaalum
serndhe vazhndha
ovvoru nodiyum
ninaive santhosam

kadal moozhgiya theevugalai
kan parvaigal arivadhillai
adhupole unnul moolgivitten

Uyire uyire piriyadhe
uyirai thookki eriyadhe
unnai pirindhaal
ulagam kidaiyaathe
o oh..

Un kaikorthu adi naan
sendra idam
thananthaniyaai engae
vandhaai endre ketkiradhe

un thol saaindhu adi
naan nindra maram
nizhalai ellaam surutikondu
neruppaai erikkiradhe

..vidum en thanimai
ulagam vidum un pirivai
uyir mattum nambida
marukirathe..

Uyire uyire piriyadhe
uyirai thookki eriyadhe
unnai pirindhaal
ulagam kidaiyaathe
o oh..

kanave kanave kalaiyadhe
kanneer thuliyil karaiyadhe
nee illaamal irave vidiyathe
o  oh..

seo.title: Uyire Uyire Piriyadhe Song Lyrics Santhosh Subramaniam
seo.description: Get the complete Uyire Uyire Piriyadhe Song Lyrics Santhosh Subramaniam from Santhosh Subramaniam. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by Devi Sri Prasad(DSP) and sung by Sagar. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Na Muthukumar, Santhosh Subramaniam, Devi Sri Prasad(DSP), Sagar, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
